ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'

about.summary: Tools for writing and debugging R code. Provides: '%.>%' dot-pipe (an 'S3' configurable pipe), unpack/to (R style multiple assignment/return), 'build_frame()'/'draw_frame()' ('data.frame' example tools), 'qc()' (quoting concatenate), ':=' (named map builder), 'let()' (converts non-standard evaluation interfaces to parametric standard evaluation interfaces, inspired by 'gtools::strmacro()' and 'base::bquote()'), and more.

Tools for writing and debugging R code. Provides: '%.>%' dot-pipe (an 'S3' configurable pipe), unpack/to (R style multiple assignment/return), 'build_frame()'/'draw_frame()' ('data.frame' example tools), 'qc()' (quoting concatenate), ':=' (named map builder), 'let()' (converts non-standard evaluation interfaces to parametric standard evaluation interfaces, inspired by 'gtools::strmacro()' and 'base::bquote()'), and more.

name: r-wrapr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.1.0" %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-wrapr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/wrapr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/wrapr/wrapr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e1cbb0b632c003d11635171317d5b4de1f38582a1908fde8409d474edcc355e4

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]

  host:
    - r-base

  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('wrapr')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('wrapr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/WinVector/wrapr, https://winvector.github.io/wrapr/
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: 'Tools for writing and debugging R code. Provides: ''%.>%'' dot-pipe (an ''S3'' configurable pipe), unpack/to (R style multiple assignment/return), ''build_frame()''/''draw_frame()'' (''data.frame'' example tools), ''qc()'' (quoting concatenate), '':='' (named map builder), ''let()'' (converts non-standard evaluation
    interfaces to parametric standard evaluation interfaces, inspired by ''gtools::strmacro()'' and ''base::bquote()''), and more.'
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Maintainer: John Mount <jmount@win-vector.com>

# Description: Tools for writing and debugging R code. Provides: '%.>%' dot-pipe (an 'S3' configurable pipe), unpack/to (R style multiple assignment/return), 'build_frame()'/'draw_frame()' ('data.frame' example tools), 'qc()' (quoting concatenate), ':=' (named map builder), 'let()' (converts non-standard evaluation interfaces to parametric standard evaluation interfaces, inspired by 'gtools::strmacro()' and 'base::bquote()'), and more.

# Encoding: UTF-8
